column5: Another year has come and gone, well almost. I ponder over the year I have had and even though I never got out much, and for good reason. It was good to get out with friends just the same. I'm now looking forward to my Daughters first Christmas to which I have not  had this much excitement since I was a small lad. I cant wait to dress up as  Santa  for her on Christmas morning. She is growing so fast its crazy.   I would like to wish all my fellow OFC members a Merry Merry  Christmas. Remember to be safe. Hope the fat guy in Red brings you all that you asked for.
Merry Christmas to you too! this is my sons 1st real christmas... he was only a month old last year. so its an exciting time! wish u and ur family all the best my friend!
Merry Christmas to you and yours as well!
